item.title: Set up built-in authentication for Azure Static Web App
item.description: This is the second part in a series covering Azure Static Web Apps. In the previous post I showed how to deploy a static web app. The web app was deployed successfully and open to the public to visit. What if you want to restrict access to the app to just a few users you trust? Azure Static Web Apps offers a couple of solutions without having to write a lot of code.
